title: Computational Modeling and Machine Learning for Complex Physical Systems
text:
Mimicking Biological Cilia



Hair-like organelles in animals & microorganisms
Perform both sensing and actuation functions
Inspire biomimetic engineering in microfluidics

title: Computational Modeling and Machine Learning for Complex Physical Systems
text:
Numerical Modeling



In-house solver in Fortran, C, Python with CUDA GPU acceleration
Supports multi-cilia & particle interactions with custom BCs
Extending to 3D code

title: Computational Modeling and Machine Learning for Complex Physical Systems
text:
Modeling Cloud Microphysics



Cloud droplet growth is hard to capture in LES due to assumptions.
We use DNS + clustering to better map droplets to superdroplets.
Train an ML model and predict an improved estimation of growth rates

title: Computational Modeling and Machine Learning for Complex Physical Systems
text:
Modeling Cloud Microphysics



Achieved good prediction accuracy for supersaturation (R² ≈ 0.9)
Ongoing a posteriori analysis demonstrates applicability in LES

title: Computational Modeling and Machine Learning for Complex Physical Systems
text:
Machine Learning for Compressible Flows



SU2: open-source solver for compressible CFD
NICFD module extends to non-ideal fluid simulations
Uses MLPs or LUTs to model fluid properties
My GSoC work: improving efficiency and usability of SU2’s ML module

title: Computational Modeling and Machine Learning for Complex Physical Systems
